markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Jaggaki](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1557)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Jaggaki](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1557)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 52</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater staff of necromancy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=360)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +22 

+1 status to all saves vs. [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)
</row>

**HP** 200
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 20, physical 15 (except magic bludgeoning)

**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +26 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d4+12 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand +25 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 4d8 negative plus paralyzing touch

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +25 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+12 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 34, attack +26
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2)
- **2nd**
[Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123)
- **7th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96)

**Bones of Stone** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirements** The target is standing on or adjacent to a stone surface. **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Jaggaki calls upon unquiet spirits within the land, causing a giant skeletal arm made of jagged stone to reach out of a stone surface adjacent to a creature within 60 feet. Jaggaki makes a hand Strike against the target via this stone arm rather than using his own hand. If the Strike hits, it deals 4d6 additional bludgeoning damage.

**Drain Soul Cage** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Jaggaki taps into his soul cage's power to cast any arcane spell up to the highest level he can cast, even if the spell being cast is not one of his prepared spells. His soul cage doesn't need to be present for him to use this ability.

**Paralyzing Touch**  ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A creature damaged by Jaggaki's hand Strike must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save. The creature becomes [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 round on a failure. On a critical failure, the creature is paralyzed permanently, falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), and seems dead. A DC 25 [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check reveals the victim is alive.

**Steady Spellcasting**   If another creature's reaction would disrupt Jaggaki's spellcasting action, Jaggaki attempts a DC 15 flat check. If he succeeds, his action isn't disrupted.

</column>
name: Jaggaki

Frequency once per round; Effect Jaggaki calls upon unquiet spirits within the land, causing a giant skeletal arm made of jagged stone to reach out of a stone surface adjacent to a creature within 60 feet. Jaggaki makes a hand Strike against the target via this stone arm rather than using his own hand. If the Strike hits, it deals 4d6 additional bludgeoning damage. Drain Soul Cage Reaction Frequency once per day; Effect Jaggaki taps into his soul cage's power to cast any arcane spell up to the highest level he can cast, even if the spell being cast is not one of his prepared spells. His soul cage doesn't need to be present for him to use this ability. Paralyzing Touch (Arcane, Curse, Incapacitation, Necromancy) A creature damaged by Jaggaki's hand Strike must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save. The creature becomes paralyzed for 1 round on a failure. On a critical failure, the creature is paralyzed permanently, falls prone, and seems dead. A DC 25 Medicine check reveals the victim is alive. Steady Spellcasting If another creature's reaction would disrupt Jaggaki's spellcasting action, Jaggaki attempts a DC 15 flat check. If he succeeds, his action isn't disrupted.
